name: EnovaPoint
overview:
EnovaPoint is IT software company, which provides customized solutions and applications within Microsoft SharePoint platform.

The main activities of EnovaPoint are: SharePoint solutions; SharePoint products and Web Parts development; SharePoint performance and usability optimization; Support, training of and consulting the users of developed information systems and programs; SharePoint project management and outsourcing.

EnovaPoint has created two new applications for Microsoft SharePoint: JungleDoc (document management add-on) and JungleMail (Personalized group mailer) which are available on the market.
